thread.section_title: Holabird Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Holabird Sports | www.holabirdsports.com
thread.title: Curtis Aron
thread.title_full: Holabird Sports reviewed by Curtis Aron

author: Curtis Aron
title: Curtis Aron
text: I spoke with a lady on the telephone regarding the return of an item that arrived damaged. She was rude and unhelpful. She even cut me off while I was talking. I ordered a total of 6 pairs of shoes from them. I will definitely find a different place to spend my money in the future.
